(Simplified: 浈)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 貞 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 貞 [ zhēn ] virtuous, chaste, pure; loyal
①(湞水)水名，在中國廣東省。
湞江 [ zhēn jiāng ]: Zhenjiang district of Shaoguan City 韶关市 , Guangdong
湞江區 [ zhēn jiāng qū ]: Zhenjiang district of Shaoguan City 韶关市 , Guangdong

湞字的基本解释

湞
zhēn
见“浈”。

湞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhēn］
［《廣韻》陟盈切，平清，知。］
［《廣韻》宅耕切，平耕，澄。］
“浈1”的繁体字。
水名。广东省北江的上游，源出大庾岭。

湞字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　湞； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页637第20
【唐韻】陟盈切【集韻】知盈切，?音貞。水名。【說文】水出南海龍川，西入溱。【前漢·地理志】桂陽郡有湞陽縣。　又【廣韻】宅耕切【集韻】除耕切，?音橙。又【集韻】虛庚切，音亨。又癡貞切，音檉。義?同。　又【集韻】抽庚切，音瞠。水貌。

[①]［zhēn］
["Guang Yun" Zhi Ying cut, calm and clear. ]
["Guangyun" House ploughing and cutting, flat ploughing, clear. ]

Water name. The upstream of Beijiang River in Guangdong Province originates from Dayu Ridge.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　浈; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 637 No. 20
[Tang Yun] Zhiying cut [Ji Yun] Zhiying cut,? Yinzhen. Water name. [Said the text] Water flows out of Longchuan in the South China Sea and enters Qin in the west. [Pre-Han Geography] There is Zhenyang County in Guiyang County.　[Guangyun] House farming and cutting [Jiyun] In addition to farming and cutting, the sound is orange. Also 【Jiyun】Xu Gengqie, Yinheng. I'm crazy again, and the sound is tame. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] Pumping Geng and cutting, and the sound is stunned. Water appearance.
